description:
Dolce Rose EDT - A Vibrant Floral Symphony

Experience the captivating allure of Dolce Rose Eau de Toilette, a luminous floral fragrance that celebrates the essence of femininity and joy. This exquisite bestselling scent from Dolce & Gabbana captures the delicate beauty of roses in full bloom, creating an irresistible sensory experience that's both playful and sophisticated. âœ¨

75ml Women Eau de Toilette EDT Dolce & Gabbana

The Enchanting Dolce Rose Fragrance Profile

This delightful composition unfolds in a harmonious blend of vibrant notes that dance on your skin throughout the day. The rose fragrance is masterfully crafted to evoke feelings of joy and femininity. ðŸŒ¸

Crisp Green Apple, Mandarin Orange, Redcurrant Rose Absolute, Lily of the Valley, Peony White Musk, Sandalwood, Cashmeran

Key Features of Dolce Rose EDT

  • ðŸ’« A fresh, youthful interpretation of the classic rose scent
  • ðŸŒ¿ Natural ingredients of the highest quality
  • ðŸ”¥ Long-lasting fragrance that evolves beautifully throughout the day
  • ðŸ’Ž Iconic bottle design with elegant rose-inspired details
  • âœ¨ Perfect for everyday wear and special occasions alike

The Story Behind Dolce Rose

Launched in 2021, Dolce Rose EDT represents the joyful spirit of the Dolce collection by Dolce & Gabbana. This celebrated Italian fashion house created this fragrance to embody the essence of modern femininity â€“ playful, confident, and naturally beautiful. The scent draws inspiration from the gardens of Sicily, where roses bloom in vibrant abundance against the Mediterranean landscape.

The stunning bottle continues the iconic Dolce design tradition with its rounded cap resembling a precious stone, while the delicate rose hue perfectly captures the essence of this new arrival in the Dolce collection. Each detail reflects the meticulous craftsmanship and attention to detail that defines the luxury fragrance world.

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Dolce Rose EDT last on skin?
Dolce Rose Eau de Toilette offers a moderate longevity of 4-6 hours on most skin types. As an EDT concentration, it provides a lighter, fresher experience than an EDP. For extended wear, apply to pulse points and layer with complementary rose-scented body products from the Dolce & Gabbana line. The fragrance evolves beautifully throughout the day, with the vibrant top notes transitioning to a soft, musky dry-down that remains close to the skin.
